intents.tag: Medarbejdere arbejder i GITO - Strategy and Transformation i Novo Nordisk
patterns: Which employees work in GITO - Strategy and Transformation at Novo Nordisk?
responses:
I'm not entirely sure yet, but Erik and Nina work there for sure. 
Erik is the Head of LPM and local LACE, and Nina is a student assistant in the department. 
They are super nice üòç.

A smart organisation effectively utilizes people, processes and technology. We do this by applying data, and automation to enhance our operations, boost our performance, and achieve superior results. A smart organisation is distinguished by its adaptability to change, its ability to learn from experience, and its capacity to leverage its capabilities. Being smart not only applies to internal operations, but also to external partnerships. As a smart organisation, we strive to set ourselves up for success by making sustainable, bold and innovative decisions.
